name: Gov. Henry McMaster
tweet: Congratulations @dawnstaley on this tremendous achievement! Best of luck to you and the @GamecockWBB team this Friday against Louisville.   You make South Carolina proud!

name: Gov. Henry McMaster
tweet: Proud to join the South Carolina Military Department this morning for SC Military Day at the Statehouse.   In South Carolina we are proud of our longstanding military tradition and we must do all that we can to continue to support our military in South Carolina.  https://t.co/KrpwDdtb1D

name: Gov. Henry McMaster
tweet: Congratulations to @NucorCorp Steel on winning the title #CoolestThingMadeInSC. South Carolina is a manufacturing powerhouse. Thanks to the dedicated and innovative manufacturing workforce in our state, we have built a global reputation of building things and building them well.

name: Gov. Henry McMaster
tweet: Joined United Community Bank to celebrate the groundbreaking of their new corporate headquarters in Greenville. This will not only create new jobs in the short term but will pave the way for a stronger South Carolina economy for years to come.  https://t.co/APRyCy0Um4

name: Gov. Henry McMaster
tweet: We have an abundance of opportunity in South Carolina and I’m excited to see where this adventure takes these students.

name: Gov. Henry McMaster
tweet: Thrilled to join @RoadtripNation at their kick-off event today in Darlington. name: Gov. Henry McMaster
tweet: Riley Faith is an inspiration to us all and represents the very best of South Carolina. Her story is courageous and she serves as an example of how we can all make the world a better place.   Congratulations, Riley!

name: Gov. Henry McMaster
tweet: Our work together has been close and constant and his leadership has produced unprecedented growth and prosperity for all the people in our great state. I look forward to continuing our partnership through the end of this session.

tweet: South Carolina’s elite workforce continues to attract top tier businesses and today’s announcement by Trane Technologies’ Thermo King will further boost our reputation as a state that can get any job done.

tweet: Stan has helped turn Hilton Head into the golf and tennis destination it is today and has raised funds for numerous charitable organizations.   He exemplifies what it means to be an Order of Palmetto recipient. We thank him for his commitment to serving South Carolina.

name: Gov. Henry McMaster
tweet: While other states are working to defund law enforcement, we are finding new ways to invest even more into them.   It's crucial we adopt this proposal and increase the pay of our state law enforcement officers.  https://t.co/Ee8XTg0Ft8

name: Gov. Henry McMaster
tweet: Investments like the one here today have helped drive South Carolina’s economy to be one of the strongest in the country.

name: Gov. Henry McMaster
tweet: If fully adopted, the recommendations that this report provides will make an immediate impact in recruiting and retaining officers in each agency statewide.  I’m confident that the Senate will see this proposal and agree that this investment MUST be made.

name: Gov. Henry McMaster
tweet: In South Carolina, we recognize the importance of our law enforcement officers. That is why I called for a comprehensive review to address our problems with recruitment and retention. name: Gov. Henry McMaster
tweet: Please join Peggy and me in praying for the people of Ukraine during this dark hour. Russia’s invasion of their sovereign nation must be met with a unified response from our nation and allies.

name: Gov. Henry McMaster
tweet: .@SChousespeaker, @murrellsmith, @GarySimrill, and the rest of The House of Representatives just took a huge first step towards cutting South Carolina’s income tax.   Our work will not be done this session until I sign a major tax cut into law.

name: Gov. Henry McMaster
tweet: Today I have selected Acting Director Eden Hendrick to be the next executive director of the South Carolina Department of Juvenile Justice.   In her short time with the agency, Ms. Hendrick has demonstrated that she is precisely the right person to lead DJJ at this time.

name: Gov. Henry McMaster

tweet: By investing in postsecondary education at our technical colleges, we are investing in the current and future workforce.

name: Gov. Henry McMaster
tweet: Thanks to today’s wonderful announcement by the Board of Economic Advisors, we can accelerate our income tax cut, cutting the rate to 6.5% right away, and two years ahead of schedule.

name: Gov. Henry McMaster
tweet: In honor of Mr. Limehouse’s extraordinary service, I will order the flags atop the Statehouse and state buildings to be lowered to half-staff from sunrise to sunset on the day of his funeral.

name: Gov. Henry McMaster
tweet: He was an advisor and confidant of many state leaders, including Governors Campbell and Beasley. His positive influence on our state is enormous. Peggy and I send our prayers and love to the entire Limehouse family.

name: Gov. Henry McMaster
tweet: As commission chairman, then secretary of the Department of Transportation, Mr. Limehouse pushed for the creation of the State Infrastructure Bank to fund important projects, including the Ravenel Bridge.
